text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with scalloped oysters a super

actually it's not like 3/4 of a cup it

which were like huge so I'm going to

to give him a few snips here and there
just to break them up a little bit by
the way if you can get fresh shucked
please do if you can't make sure you get

alright so my oysters are ready I'm

out
so I just wanted to use the word a basis

please let this cool like almost

you see here in this shot if you let it

actually sort of come together and

actually one of those dishes is better
warm than it is hot which also makes it
a great Thanksgiving Christmas New
Year's whatever side dish because you

if it cools off it's actually better
that way also portion size I didn't have

why you see it on the plate like this
you don't want to eat a whole plate of
this that pan right there will serve 12
14 people everyone just gets a little
